node.name: lcfirst - return a string with just the next letter in lower case
node.description:
Returns the value of EXPR with the first character lowercased. This is the internal function implementing the \l escape in double-quoted strings. Respects current LC_CTYPE locale if use locale in force. See [perlman:perllocale|the perllocale manpage].

If EXPR is omitted, uses $_.
node.title: perlfunc:lcfirst
